data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of Maldah to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Maldah, West Bengal, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the county of Maldah unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.

data.section_summary: On average, 8 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Maldah, West Bengal, India.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Maldah, West Bengal, India.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Maldah, West Bengal, India know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Kandu people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Kandu people know you.
the county of Maldah has (about) 43,877 people who know Jesus, 48,397 people who know about him culturally, and 3,896,526 people who are far from Jesus.
Father, convict the 43,877 believers in Maldah to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.

data.section_summary:
the county of Maldah, West Bengal, India has a population of 3,988,800.

We estimate Maldah has 43,877 people who might know Jesus, 48,397 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,896,526 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 3,896,526, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

location.name: Maldah
location.people_groups_list: Malto, Kotal, Persian, Mirdhas (Muslim traditions), Bhalla
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Malto (189,000), Kotal (26,000), Persian (7,500), Mirdhas (Muslim traditions) (600), Bhalla (3,600)
